pageContext._xxxcollectionOwnerNamextxt: McKissick Museum, South Carolina Broadcasters Association Archives, University of South Carolina
pageContext._xxxcollectionDescriptionxtxt: Contains audio and video artifacts, photographs and papers relating to early South Carolina radio, 1930s-1960s, plus several thousand 78rpm records, reel-to-reel tapes and cassettes. Also includes extensive scrapbooks and a substantial amount of administrative materials from several South Carolina radio stations.
